titles.title: His Life Within Me, Won't Leave Me The Same

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
His life within me, won't leave me the same.
His life within me, knows dying is gain.
His life within me, is changing my name.
O glory to God, it's His life within.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
His life within me, can stand every test.
His life within me, gives me complete rest.
His life within me, will overcome death.
O glory to God, it's His life within.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
His life within me, is making us one.
His life within me, our trials overcomes.
His life within me, knows it is done.
O glory to God, it's His life within.
